headline: Stifel Lifts MPLX Price Target Amid Northwind Acquisition Growth Potential
summary: MPLX LP (NYSE:MPLX) ranks among the best stocks to buy for retirement. Stifel raised its price target for MPLX LP (NYSE:MPLX) to $60 from $57 on August 14, retaining a Buy rating on the company. The price target hike follows MPLX’s second-quarter 2025 earnings, which Stifel reported were below forecasts. While pointing to MPLX’s recent […]
